标准说法是 vassal states首先它是个集体概念,是封建社会下相互独立而又统一的各小的王国,由大小诸侯在天子统一下,行使行政管理权力。 0人 0人回答时间 2008-.
字典中藩字的解释... ... 藩国 fānguó [vassal state] 古代王朝的属国;诸侯国 [government repository] 清代布政司所属的粮钱储库.
战争之王资料片新增了一种外交条约类型:附庸国(Vassal State)。附庸国是臣服并效忠于其他国家的半独立政权,附庸国向其宗主国提供贡礼,以换取宗主国在军事上提供.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from medieval Latin vassallus 'retainer', of Celtic origin; compare with vavasour

entry.def: In feudal society, a vassal was a man who gave military service to a lord, in return for which he was protected by the lord and received land to live on.
If you say that one country is a vassal of another, you mean that it is controlled by it.

example.ex: Opponents of the treaty argue that monetary union will turn France into a vassal of Germany.
example.tran: 协定的反对者认为货币联盟会使法国沦为德国的附庸国。
